original_text: (The Pharisees and all the Jews do not eat food until they have washed their hands carefully. They do this because of what their leaders taught them.
korean_text: (바리새인들과 모든 유대인들은 장로들의 전통을 지키어 손을 잘 씻지 않고서는 음식을 먹지 아니하며

sentences.original_text: The Pharisees and all the Jews
until they have washed their hands carefully
because of what their leaders taught them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 지도자들이 그들에게 가르친 것 때문입니다
